Logo
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png, svg

field.label: Small Logo
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png, svg

field.label: Use Ajax Menu
field.comment: If set "Yes", the drop-downs of menu will be load by ajax instead of being loaded directly

field.label: Select Vertical Menu
field.comment: Vertical menu is used or not depending theme style (displayed beside top slideshow or displayed when hovering menu title).

field.label: Align Vertical Menu Height
field.comment: Display "More View" button when the vertical menu height is longer than the slideshow height.

field.label: Display Vertical Menu as Default?
field.comment: If set "No", menu will be displayed if you click the title (this option is only applied for some special designs).

field.label: Display Vertical Menu by Clicking Menu Title? (In Sticky Header or in Inner Pages)
field.comment: If set "No", menu will be displayed if you hover the title.

field.label: Hide Vertical Menu by Clicking The Area Arround?
field.comment: If set "No", menu will only be hide if you click the title again.

field.label: Select Sidebar Menu
field.comment: Sidebar menu is used or not depending on theme style (displayed on toggle sidebar).

field.label: Use Hovering Behavior for Sidebar Menu.
field.comment: Hovering on menu item to view the sub items instead of clicking. Only apply for menu on left sidebar.

field.label: Customer Greeting format
field.comment:
Use for the greeting on account sidebar/dropdown/popup. Default: Hi {{firstname}}.
Note:
{{firstname}} will be replaced by customer first name.
{{fullname}} will be replaced by customer full name. Leave empty to use default.

field.label: Custom Layout XML
field.comment: Carefully: Only use for developer. Don't write anything here if you are not sure about the result.

field.label: Show Caption at Bottom Side of Main Image
Full Screen Zoom
field.comment: Zoom step in percents for the fullscreen view (integer value)

field.label: Display Product Labels on the Right Side of Product Image
field.comment: If set "No", the labels will be displayed on left side of product image.

field.label: Display Sale Countdown Timer
field.comment: Display Sale Countdown Timer when product has special price and "Special To Date" is set

field.label: Size Chart Attribute
field.comment: The code of product attribute used as size chart popup content. Note: Empty "Size Chart Link Label" field below to use the attribute name as link label.

field.label: Size Chart Attribute Set Mappings
field.comment:
Use syntax below:
<attribute set 1 name>:<CMS block 1 identifier>
<attribute set 2 name>:<CMS block 2 identifier>
(Break line to add new mapping).
E.g.:

Default:codazon-sizechart-default
Women Clothing:codazon-sizechart-women-clothing

Note: Empty "Size Chart Link Label" field below to use the cms block name as link label.

field.label: Custom Flexibe Tab (Use Product Attributes)
field.comment: To add more tabs, you can go to menu Stores > Attributes > Product. Add new attribute. Separate attribute codes by comma (,).

field.label: Tabs Order
field.comment:
The sort order of tabs in product view page (use layout block names range for sorting). You can use some block names below to input your custom order: product.info.description, product.attributes, reviews.tab, product-tab-codazon_custom_tab, product-tab-[product attribute code], product-tab-cms-[cms block identifier]. E.g.:
product.attributes,product.attributes,reviews.tab

field.label: Removed Tabs
field.comment:
The tabs need to be removed. You can use some block names below to input your custom removed tabs: product.info.description, product.attributes, reviews.tab, product-tab-codazon_custom_tab, product-tab-[product attribute code], product-tab-cms-[cms block identifier]. E.g.:
product.attributes,reviews.tab

field.label: Maximum Height of Details Tab
field.comment: If the product description is too long, and the height of Details tab is larger than your defined value, a "More View" button will be displayed. Leave empty if you don't use "more view" feature.

field.label: Enable Sticky "Add to Cart - Qty"
field.comment: Display sticky "Add to cart - Qty" block when scrolling the product view page.

field.label: Maximum Height of Category Description
field.comment: If the category description is too long, and the height of Description section is larger than your defined value, a "More View" button will be displayed. Leave empty if you don't use "more view" feature.

field.label: Custom Layout XML
field.comment: Carefully: Only use for developer. Don't write anything here if you are not sure about the result.

field.comment: If set "No", the subcategories will be displayed as grid.

field.comment: If set "No", the subcategories will be displayed as grid.

field.label: Enable Hovered Title
field.comment: If set "Yes", the category name is only displayed when hovering the category thumbnail.

field.label: Thumbnail Placeholder
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png, svg

Google API key
field.comment: Go to https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key to get key. If this field is empty, Google Map feature won't work

field.label: Google map url (No API needed)
field.comment:
If you don't have api key. You can use the Google map url instead. However, the features can be limited.

Go this page to get map url.

Note: After get the HTML code, only copy the src attribute value of <iframe> tag and paste it to this field. E.g.:

https://maps.google.com/maps?q=6505%20boulevard%20Henri-Bourassa,%20Montr%C3%A9al,%20Quebec,%20H1G2V5&t=&z=13&ie=UTF8&iwloc=&output=embed

field.label: Replacement Static Block
field.comment: If you don't have API key, you can use a CMS Block content instead of google map. Leave empty if you don't want to show anything.

field.label: Display Floating "Shop By" Button
field.comment: Display floating "Shop By" button in category page or search page.

field.label: Display Search Box under Header
field.comment: Show search box fully instead of showing only search icon (to open search box).

field.label: Use Custom Bottom Toolbar
field.comment: If set "No", the default toolbar will be displayed. If set "Yes", you can customize the toolbar with the field "Custom Bottom Toolbar" below.

Display Header and Footer in Checkout Page
